alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wheeler County through 700 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Alamo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Alamo, Glenwood, Scotland, Jordan, Spring Hill and Landsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
